We are coming up with new and exciting communities very soon.
SHEROES is a women only community and I declare I am a female.
Talk About Things That Matter To You
The following changes will take place:
• All members will remain members of the close community.
• Posts and notifications will be hidden from the members who have not joined the community.
• All members will remain members of the open community.
• Posts will be visible to all SHEROES members.
• Users with pending requests will be added as members.
Press back again to exit the app
We are actively trying to improve SHEROES to better cater to your needs. Tap a star to rate. Leave us a note too, if you can!
We are sorry to see you go.

SHEROES- Women and Dreams: Your women only space, to grow every single day and have fun all the way. Discover your passions, design your dreams and ramp up your success, because WE LOVE AMBITION.
SHEROES is the world’s largest community for women. SHEROES is a place to bring all of you - your heart, mind, and ambitions. Be the woman every woman looks upto.


a. COMMUNITIES: Discover a private, anonymous, secure and happy circle of support. Connect, network and hangout with peers and influencers from your field and other walks of life. Share your everyday achievements and inspire others.


b. ARTICLES: Grow everyday with a bunch of new stories and how to articles curated just for you.


c. JOBS: Explore Work Opportunities- work from home jobs, part time jobs, back to work programs, freelancing and business opportunities.

You are requested to read this Terms and Conditions carefully. By using this website www.sheroes.in or ordering or purchasing any product or service from this website you agree to accept and be bound by all the terms and conditions of this agreement.
The Terms of Service Agreement (the \'Agreement\') will govern all users/visitors or any person (hereinafter may also be referred to as "Users") who use, register or visit or access this website (www.sheroes.in) (the "site")or use any type of service from Applied Life Private Limited (hereinafter may also be referred to as "SHEROES")and its affiliates. Applied Life Private Limited, a company incorporated under the Companies Act, 1956 shall also be hereinafter referred to as "SHEROES"
By accessing and using the site , or any other services of SHEROES, you agree to be governed by the terms and conditions of this agreement as well as any other specific terms / rules/ policies/ guidelines prevailing or posted on the site. These Terms will apply to any new services or features introduced on the Site. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to check on the practices related to collection, use and storage of user information. All the materials contained in the website are provided for informational purposes only and shall not be construed as a license, an advisory, fiduciary or professional relationship between you and Applied Life.
You shall abide by the Terms and Conditions set forth below in this agreement. You will be bound and constitute to accept by these terms and conditions on accessing or using any service from Applied Life Private Limited. Applied Life Private Limited reserves the right to change or revise the terms and conditions of this Agreement from time to time on this website. The changes or revisions and shall be effective after the date of revision. Your use of the website or any services after changes or revision will constitute as your acceptance to the changes terms and conditions set forth in the agreement. This agreement does not alter any other agreement that you might have undertaken with Applied Life Private Limited in written for any other products and services.
Our website www.sheroes.in offers services for certain products and services. By placing an order or purchasing the products or services through our website you provide your unconditional agreement and consent to the terms and conditions of this agreement.
Service Tax applicable as per the rates prevailing for the time being shall be charged in the respective services being purchased or utilized by you.
The web pages available at SHEROES and all linked pages ("Site"/"sites"), are owned and operated by Applied Life Private Limited and is accessed by you under the Terms of Service described below .
Please read these terms carefully before using the services. By accessing the site, viewing any content or using any services available on the site (as each is defined below) you are agreeing to be bound by these terms, which together with our Privacy Policy, governs our relationship with you in relation to the site. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the site.
The Site is an online community which enables corporate professionals, especially women and employers to complete profiles, post comments and images, browse content, apply for jobs, make new connections, share opinions and ideas, promote their work, participate in contests and promotions, and access and/or purchase services from time to time made available on the Site ("Services").
Services include, but are not limited to, any service and/or content SHEROES makes available to or performs for you, as well as the offering of any materials displayed, transmitted or performed on the Site or through the Services. Content ("Content") includes, but is not limited to text, user comments, messages, information, data, graphics, news articles, photographs, images, illustrations, and software.
Your access to and use of the Site may be interrupted from time to time as a result of equipment malfunction, updating, maintenance or repair of the Site or any other reason within or outside the control of SHEROES. SHEROES reserves the right to suspend or discontinue the availability of the Site and/or any Service and/or remove any Content at any time at its sole discretion and without prior notice. SHEROES may also impose limits on certain features and Services or restrict your access to parts of or all of the Site and the Services without notice or liability. The Site should not be used or relied upon for storage of your content and images and you are directed to retain your own copies of all Content posted on the Site.
The Sheroes site sends information that it considers useful to its users by email and as notifications to its mobile application(s). Users have been given the functionality to unsubscribe from receiving these application. SHEROES will not assume responsibity of any discomfort or loss caused to user because of these messages if user failed to disable these from provided messages and/or contact SHEROES customer care for resolution.
The site is a public site with free access to all users and Applied Life Private Limited cannot monitor the responses that a person may receive in response to information user has displayed on the site. The individual/company would have to conduct its own background checks on the bonafide nature of all response(s). Applied Life Private Limited assumes no liability for the quality and genuineness of any data, information or responses on this site.
Applied Life Private Limited will not be liable on account of any inaccuracy of information on this web site. It is the responsibility of the visitor to further research the information on the site. Any breach of privacy or of the information provided by the user to Applied Life Private Limited to be placed on the website by technical or any other means is not the responsibility of Applied Life Private Limited. Applied Life Private Limited does not guarantee confidentiality of information provided to it by any person acquiring/using all/any information displayed on the www.sheroes.in website or any of its other websites / domains owned and operated by Applied Life Private Limited.
As a condition to using our Services (although you can browse certain content without being logged in), you are required to open an account with SHEROES and select a password and username, and to provide registration information. The registration information you provide must be accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your SHEROES account.
You may not use as a username the name of another person or entity or that is not lawfully available for use, a name or trade mark that is subject to any rights of another person or entity other than you without appropriate authorization, or a name that is otherwise offensive, vulgar or obscene. You will be solely responsible for any unlawful acts of yours or your account. SHEROES will not be liable in any way for any of your act\'s or any third party acts that you avail by using this site.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and are solely responsible for all activities resulting from the use of your password and conducted through your SHEROES account.
You may provide information on certain sections of the site. As a user, you are bound to provide true and accurate and complete information, and can update such information as necessary. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to check on the practices related to collection, use and storage of your information.Therefore you are advised to review and satisfy yourself as to the Privacy Policy of any associates or linked website where your personal information is requested.
On using the website or any other products or services of Applied Life Private Limited for any purpose you give your unconditional and wilful consent and agree that you will not use the Website for illegal purposes. Applied Life Private Limited is not responsible for any damages resulting from use of this website by anyone. You will abide by all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations in your use of the Website (including laws regarding intellectual property). You will not engage, directly or indirectly, in transmission of "spam", chain letters, junk mail or any other type of unsolicited communication.
You will not defame, harass, abuse, or disrupt other users of the Website. You will not upload, post, transmit, publish, or distribute any material or information that is unlawful, or which may potentially be perceived as being harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, libelous, vulgar, obscene, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable.You will not spam the database maintained by www.sheroes.in / Applied Life Private Limited or indiscriminately and repeatedly forward mail that may be considered spam etc. etc. Any conduct of the user in violation of this clause shall entitle Applied Life Private Limited to forthwith terminate all services to the user without notice and to forfeit any amounts paid by him.
You are prohibited from uploading, posting, transmitting, updating or sharing: any information that:
belongs to another person and to which you do not have any right to; is grossly harmful, harassing, blasphemous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, paedophilic, libellous, invasive of another\'s privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically objectionable, disparaging, relating or encouraging money laundering or gambling, or otherwise unlawful in any manner whatever; harm minors in any way; infringes any patent, trademark, copyright or other proprietary rights; violates any law for the time being in force; deceives or misleads the addressee about the origin of such messages or communicates any information which is grossly offensive or menacing in nature; impersonate another person; contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer resource; threatens the unity, integrity, defence, security or sovereignty of India, friendly relations with foreign states, or or public order or causes incitement to the commission of any cognisable offence or prevents investigation of any offence or is insulting any other nation. As a condition of use, you promise not to use the site or any services of SHEROES for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms, or any other purpose not reasonably intended by SHEROES. By way of example, and not as a limitation, you agree not to use the Services:
To abuse, harass, threaten, impersonate or intimidate any person. To post or transmit, or cause to be posted or transmitted, any Content that is libellous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, abusive, offensive, profane, or that infringes any copyright or other right of any person. For any purpose (including posting or viewing Content) that is not permitted under the laws of the jurisdiction where you use the Services. To post or transmit, or cause to be posted or transmitted, any communication or solicitation designed or intended to obtain password, account, or private information from any SHEROES user. To create or transmit unwanted \'spam\' to any person or any URL. To create multiple accounts. To post copyrighted Content which doesn\'t belong to you, with exception of Blogs, where you may post such Content with explicit mention of the author\'s name and a link to the source of the Content; With the exception of accessing RSS feeds, you will not use any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means to access the Site for any purpose without our express written permission. Additionally, you agree that you will not: (i) take any action that imposes, or may impose in our sole discretion an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on our infrastructure; (ii) interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Site or any activities conducted on the Site; or (iii) bypass any measures we may use to prevent or restrict access to the Site. To artificially inflate or alter vote counts, blog counts, comments, or any other Service or for the purpose of giving or receiving money or other compensation in exchange for votes, or for participating in any other organized effort that in any way artificially alters the results of Services To advertise to, or solicit, any user to buy or sell any products or services, or to use any information obtained from the Services in order to contact, advertise to, solicit, or sell to any user without their prior explicit consent To promote or sell Content of another person. To sell or otherwise transfer your profile. To artificially inflate or alter vote counts, blog counts, comments, or any other Service or for the purpose of giving or receiving money or other compensation in exchange for votes, or for participating in any other organized effort that in any way artificially alters the results of Services. To advertise to, or solicit, any user to buy or sell any products or services, or to use any information obtained from the Services in order to contact, advertise to, solicit, or sell to any user without their prior explicit consent. To promote or sell Content of another person. To sell or otherwise transfer your profile. SHEROES invests reasonable due diligence in employing conventionally available security measure to keep data of its users safe. But we take no guarantee of safety of this data if our servers or website application or downloaded mobile application is hacked with malicious intent and user\'s data is compromised. If a user has evidence or suspects that some other user is accessing their account to deface it or defame them, the user is expected to seek action from SHEROES by informing SHEROES. In response SHEROES may bar access of that user to its systems. However SHEROES does not assume responsibility for any subsequent successful hacking attempt of that user by employing persistent creative techniques.
With the exception of accessing RSS feeds, you will not use any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means to access the Site for any purpose without our express written permission. Additionally, you agree that you will not: (i) take any action that imposes, or may impose in our sole discretion an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on our infrastructure; (ii) interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Site or any activities conducted on the Site; or (iii) bypass any measures we may use to prevent or restrict access to the Site.

An attempt to access any SHEROES\'s electronic interface without a written permission will be deemed a criminal offense against which Applied Life Private Limited is free to use its descretion in pursuing course of legal action against the offender.
Presence of user\'s private information in SHEROES systems that was willingly given does not give the user the right to try to hack into their own account. User can only access SHEROES systems through provided user interfaces on website and mobile app. If a user loses their password they are required to retrieve it by using available functionality on the website or mobile app or get contact SHEROES customer care. Any other means employed by a user to access their own account will be deemed a violation of terms and conditions and we reserve the right to bar the user from accessing our systems

Advertisers agree and give their consent on all the terms and conditions of this agreement.
ORGANISATION / EMPLOYERS ACCOUNTS
Employers and Organisations can use SHEROES to maintain \'Organisation Pages\' and to submit listings. These listings include job opportunities, event announcements, and other listings. Organisation Accounts permit employers to interact with SHEROES members by commenting on their profiles. The following Terms and Conditions in this section are in reference to Employers / Agents / Organisations (You / Your) using SHEROES website www.sheroes.in (the Site/ website)
The following Terms and Conditions affect your legal rights and obligations. They form a legally binding contract between you and the Site. We ask you to accept these terms of use when you use SHEROES site for advertising job listings, general marketing services, and recruitment. We also take it that you agree to these terms of use when you access and use the site generally. These terms and consitions apply whenever you access the website. By completing the registration form and by entering your email address and password, you will be deemed to have accepted these terms and conditions.
Advertising Listings (Job Opportunities and Other Listings)
By approving and submitting a job opportunity to SHEROES (sheroes.in) the employer thereby commits to the terms of the listing and the associated charges (see below)
Opportunities are listed on the site for a specified period of time in exchange for a pre-agreed listing fee agreed between the employer and SHEROES. The listing is submitted \'live\' on the site once the payment has cleared. This payment is non-refundable.
For Premium listings SHEROES will commit to reasonable extensions of the job listing to attract further attention.
Sometimes opportunities are listed on the site for a specified period of time in exchange for a commitment from the Employer to pay a pre-specified fee (agreed in writing via email) if the Employer then successfully hires an SHEROES member. The terms of this agreement specify that the Employer should commit to paying the commission fee if an SHEROES member who has viewed the job listing then successfully applies for the job and accepts the job offer. The payment is due the day the successful candidate starts work. This fee is due whether or not the applicant uses SHEROES\'s internal application function. Sometimes SHEROES members will apply directly to the organisation despite having seen the listing on sheroes.in. SHEROES\'s systems provide access to a list of names and email addresses of those SHEROES members who have viewed the job listing. SHEROES can provide this list on request to the Employer for cross-checking in case of a dispute.
Agreeing to these terms and conditions in relation to a job listing is legally binding and should be seen as constituting a contract between the Employer and SHEROES.
Use of the Site
All employer members / visitors must abide by the following rules in relation to their access and use of site:
You must only make lawful use of site You must not use or access the site in a way that causes, or is likely to cause, the site to be damaged, its performance to be impaired or access to the site to be interrupted or hindered. You may not use or access the Site, or any materials displayed on the site, for any commercial purpose without prior consent. This includes, but is not limited to, posting or sending to other members advertisements, commercial messages or solicitations for products or services. You are responsible for any photographs, text or other materials that you may upload to the site for sharing with other members. You must not upload any materials, or make statements through the site, or post links to other websites which contain materials, which are inaccurate or misleading, defamatory, disrespectful, insulting, abusive, obscene, sexually explicit or vulgar or which tend to incite racial or other hatred or infringe the proprietary, data protection, privacy or other rights of any person or are otherwise illegal. The copyright and all other intellectual property rights in this site belong to SHEROES.in or its licensors. You may view and print materials on the site and make reasonable personal use of those materials, including reasonable copying. You may not use framing techniques to display this site, any part of it or any other proprietary materials of SHEROES. You may create hyperlinks to the SHEROES home page as long as the link does not use our logos or graphics and does not refer to SHEROES or any person or website associated with SHEROES in a manner which is false, misleading or derogatory. WE HAVE ALL RIGHTS IN OUR SITE (WWW.SHEROES.IN) AND ITS CONTENT. YOU GRANT SHEROES UNDISPUTABLE CERTAIN RIGHTS WHEN YOU SUBMIT YOUR CONTENT FOR SHEROES (APPLIED LIFE PRIVATE LIMITED).
By posting or submitting content on or to our site (regardless of the form or medium with respect to such content, whether text, videos, photographs, audio or otherwise), you are giving us, and our affiliates, agents and third party contractors the right to display or publish such content on our site and its affiliated publications (either in the form submitted or in the form of a derivative or adapted work), to store such content, and to distribute such content and use such content for promotional and marketing purposes. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, with respect to any video submissions to us made by you from time to time, you understand and agree that (unless you and we agree otherwise) we may, or may permit users to, based solely on functionality provided and enabled by our website, compile, re-edit, adapt or modify your video submission, or create derivative works there from, either on a stand-alone basis or in combination with other video submissions, and (unless you and we agree otherwise) you shall have no rights with respect thereto and we or our licensees shall be free to display and publish the same (as so compiled, re-edited, adapted, modified or derived) for any period. You shall be solely responsible for your own submissions and the consequences of posting or publishing them. In connection with each of your submissions, you affirm, represent, and/or warrant that: (I) you own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and authorize us to use all patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights in and to any and all such submissions to enable inclusion and use of such submissions in the manner contemplated by us and these Terms and Conditions; and (II) you have the written consent, release, and/or permission of each and every identifiable individual person in such submissions to use the name or likeness of each and every such identifiable individual person to enable inclusion and use of such submissions in the manner contemplated by us and these Terms and Conditions. In furtherance of the foregoing, you agree that you will not: (I) submit material that is copyrighted, protected by trade secret or otherwise subject to third party proprietary rights, including privacy and publicity rights, unless you are the owner of such rights or have permission from their rightful owner to post the material and to grant us all of the rights granted herein; (II) publish falsehoods or misrepresentations that could damage us or any third party; (III) submit material that is unlawful, obscene, defamatory, libelous, threatening, pornographic, harassing, hateful, racially or ethnically offensive, or encourages conduct that would be considered a criminal offense, give rise to civil liability, violate any law, or is otherwise inappropriate; or (IV) post advertisements or solicitations of business We reserve the right to remove or not publish submissions without prior notice.
An Organisation\'s Rights, Obligations and Responsibilities
You accept that, following any contact with potential employees on our site:
It shall be up to you (the Employer) and any "potential employee" to agree how to progress matters further; That you shall act in good faith and in a business-like and courteous manner; and That you shall keep strictly confidential all confidential information disclosed Where Employers are Recruitment Agents: You shall comply in all respects with all statues, rules, regulations, codes of practice and legal requirements to which you are ordinarily subject in respect of its receipt and processing of CV\'s and related matters. All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

Applied Life prohibits the posting of any information that infringes or violates the copyright rights and/or other intellectual property rights (including rights of privacy and publicity) of any person or entity.
